concept.title: Topic modules
concept.shortdesc: Several modules contain the basic topic elements and attributes. Some are specific to the generic topic and its specializations; others are shared with DITA maps. Both DTD and Schema modules are included.

p.draft-comment: this topic should be moved to the general DITA introduction. JTH

dlentry.dd: Defines the elements for authoring tables, based on the OASIS/CALS table model but with some DITA-specific extensions.
Defines metadata elements, which can appear in both topics and in maps, where metadata can be defined for multiple topics at once.
Defines common elements such as phrase or keyword that appear in both topics and maps.

dlentry.dt: topicAttr.mod, topicDefn.ent (DTD only - folded into other schema files))
dlentry.dd: Defines common DITA attributes and entities.

dlentry.dt: xml.xsd, ditaarch.xsd (Schema only - folded into other DTD files)
dlentry.dd: Defines common XML attributes and the DITA architecture version attribute.
Defines the rest of the elements in a topic.
